body.name: Safety 1st Grow and Go All-in-One Convertible Car Seat, Rear-facing 5-40 pounds, Forward-facing 22-65 pounds, and Belt-positioning booster 40-100 pounds, Aqua Pop, 1 Count (Pack of 1)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 22 hrs 36 mins
features: Built to Grow: The 3 in 1 Car Seat Built to Grow for Extended Use Through 3 Stages: Rear FACing 5 40 Pounds, Forward FACing 22 to 65 Pounds, and Belt Positioning Booster 40 to 100 Pounds

Side impACt protection: the grow and go’s side impACt protection helps keep your child safe. Carton dimensions 24.25 inches x 19.25 inches x 24.5 inches, assembled product dimensions 24.00 inches x 19.00 inches x 23.75 inches

Easy in, easy out: harness holders keep the harness in an open position so it’s easy to get your child in and out of the seat. Rear fACing height is 19 to 40 inches. Forward fACing height is 29 to 52 inches
Quickfit harness: with the quickfit harness you can easily adjust both the harness and headrest in one simple step
Wash and dry: machine washable and dryer safe seat pad features snaps that make it simple to take off of the seat; no fuss for truly easy cleaning
body.description: Get the car seat that's built to grow! From your first ride together coming home from the hospital to soccer day car pools, the 3-in-1 Grow and Go Car Seat will give your child a safer and more comfortable ride. Featuring extended use at each stage, this convertible car seat is designed to last through all your firsts with your child. For newborns to growing toddlers, the Grow and Go can be used in the rear-facing position from 5-40 pounds. It includes two comfortable grow-with-baby pillows to give your new travel companion a snug fit, and they easily remove as your baby outgrows them. In forward-facing mode, the Grow and Go keeps your child protected in a harness up to 65 pounds. In both rear-facing and forward-facing mode, harness holders keep the harness in an open position. This makes it easier for you to get your child in and out of the car seat. No more fishing for the harness and clips from behind your child – they’re right there when you need them. The QuickFit™ Harness offers additional convenience in both of these stages by letting you adjust the height of both the headrest and harness in one easy step, making it simple to give your growing child the best fit. When your child is ready to use the vehicle seat belts, remove the harness to use the Grow and Go 3-in-1 Car Seat in belt-positioning booster mode: up to 100 pounds. The headrest still adjusts easily, letting you get the best fit for your child. As your tiny baby grows into a big kid, messes are bound to happen, but the Grow and Go car seat pad makes cleanup easy. Machine washable and dryer safe, it is also designed to come off the seat easily, with no need to remove the harness. The Grow and Go is designed to provide more comfort to parents too. It takes up less room when placed rear-facing, giving up to 7 inches more leg room for parents in the front seat.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BUILD FOR KID COMFORT SAFETY WITH A VIEW What fun is a car ride if you can't see out the window? Our headrests are designed to protect little noggins and let kids see the world. BUILD TO GROW From the headrest, to the harness straps, the seat has adjustment options to fit kids from birth to 10 years RIDE IN COMFORT In forward facing mode, out seat has two position options to get the best possible fit in your vehicle. Kids can stay more comfortable in their seat, even in the upright mode position.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable, washable, comfy and safe...all you can ask for!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for a back up seat for my grand babies. We have a 22 month old and a newborn. This car seat easily adapts for both kids. My sister and I take turns babysitting one or the other on any given day and we transfer this car seat easily between our cars. The kids parents each have a car seat in their cars ( Graco SlimFit and a Diono Radian® 3QX), but they are heavy and transferring them from their mom and dads cars on a daily basis was a pain. This Safety 1st seat is lightweight and easy to get in and out of the car, but still feels solid and safe when installed. Initially it was a bit of a struggle to install as we had way more play in the seat than the one and a half inches recommended for safety. After reading the instructions more thoroughly found that if we applied weight on the seat using a knee as we were buckling it, the seat became more solid as the air from the car cushions deflated and made the seat much more solid in the car. In fact there is NO wiggling at all. It feels like its cemented into the car. The 22 month old totally loves this car seat! She likes using both cup holders and finds the cushioning quite comfortable. She easily goes to sleep when she needs to and her head is supported quite nicely. Plenty of leg room for her too as she grows. The one month old hasn't been out in it yet, but the extra padding and adjustments for him are easy schmeezy. The washable/dryable feature is the best. Our girl loves blueberries and raspberries in her snack cup so you can imagine what a mess that can make. Bought it on Prime Day and spent less than half than what the Graco cost. Great purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Omg so good for the price
reviews.reviewText: I started off with. Doona but as my baby got bigger the Doona didn’t cut it I was looomi g for something durable yet affordable I highly recommend my son loves looking out the window he felt like a big boy in this car seat .. material soft , easy to snap in ! Highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic for travel
reviews.reviewText: We own an expensive Nuna as our daily car seat. We love that seat with the exception of the weight. I was dreading taking it along on our most recent trip. We did have a need for a second car seat for our other car. I thought this might be an opportunity to kill two birds with one stone. Received this next day and gave it a good once over. The fit and finish is not on the same level as the Nuna, but I didn't expect it to be. It is a very nice car seat and has many features that make it convenient such as, extended rear facing, recline adjustment, soft material, infant insert, and attached anchor strap. The weight was amazing. It made travel so much easier. I just threw it into a generic car seat backpack bag and made it through the airport with ease. We have a lot of travel coming up and I'm so happy we have this seat.We didn't have any issues getting the seat to sit level like some other reviewers had mentioned. The instruction book does state to use a rolled towel if you have this issue. I did have some difficulty getting the seat secured tightly with the anchor straps. I ended up using both anchor strap and the seat belt to ensure the seat didn't move more than 1 inch.I would recommend this car seat if you travel a lot and are in the rear facing season with your child.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We bought this for our older daughter and right as she was outgrowing it, we decided to have our almost 1 year old try it out. It's perfect. Comfortable, good quality and safe!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice car seat
reviews.reviewText: I love this car seat. Very safe and comfortable. Pretty easy to clean. Good size not too big for the car and not too small. The only thing I would change is that it reclined.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars it does the job
reviews.reviewText: The Safety 1st Grow and Go 3-in-1 Convertible Car Seat in the Harvest Moon color scheme is nothing short of a parenting game-changer. As a parent, ensuring the safety and comfort of my child during car rides is a top priority, and this car seat has truly exceeded my expectations. Here's why it deserves a glowing 5-star review.Safety First: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5)The name says it all—Safety 1st. This car seat is packed with safety features that provide me with peace of mind every time my child is on the road. It meets or exceeds all federal safety standards, and the side-impact protection is a standout feature. Knowing that my child is cocooned in a secure and protective environment is priceless.Versatility and Longevity: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5)One of the most impressive aspects of this car seat is its adaptability. It transitions seamlessly from rear-facing to forward-facing to a booster seat, accommodating my child's growth from infancy through toddlerhood and beyond. This versatility not only saves money but also reduces the hassle of shopping for multiple car seats as my child grows.Comfort and Convenience: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5)The plush padding and cushioning of the Grow and Go car seat provide a comfortable and cozy ride for my child. The harness holders make it easy to get my child in and out of the seat without tangled straps, a convenience that every parent will appreciate. Cleaning is a breeze too, with the seat pad being machine washable and dryer safe.Easy Installation: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5)Installing this car seat is a straightforward process thanks to the clear and concise instructions. The QuickFit Harness feature allows for easy height adjustment as my child grows, eliminating the need for rethreading straps. I was able to achieve a secure installation in minutes, and the seat feels rock solid in the vehicle.Stylish Design: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5)The Harvest Moon color scheme adds a touch of style to my car's interior, making it a visually appealing addition. It's not only functional but also looks great. Safety doesn't have to come at the expense of aesthetics, and this car seat proves that.Final Thoughts:The Safety 1st Grow and Go 3-in-1 Convertible Car Seat in Harvest Moon is a true lifesaver for parents. It excels in safety, versatility, comfort, and ease of use. The fact that it grows with my child, eliminating the need for multiple car seats, is a tremendous bonus. Whether you're a new parent or looking to upgrade your child's car seat, this product is a clear winner. It's worth every penny for the peace of mind and convenience it offers. I wholeheartedly recommend the Safety 1st Grow and Go 3-in-1 Convertible Car Seat to any parent seeking a top-notch car seat for their child. It's a 5-star product in every sense.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Grandbabies!
reviews.reviewText: I have my grandkids a couple days a week. Rather than trading car seats back and forth I purchased my own. I have two of these seats and they are great. Very versatile, stylish and affordable. Fit great in my Ford Expedition.
Excelente compra, seguro, de buena calidad, tu bebe no se moverá en el camino, cuenta con un agarre firme, cómodo para el bebé,Lo recomiendo ampliamente
Mi bebé de 4 meses va muy cómodo en viajes largos y la ventaja es que conforme vaya creciendo se adaptara muy bien. Muy práctico, cómodo y de excelente calidad.

Its soft enough and have the features I want, reclining positions, 5 point harness, rear facing till older, booster. My 2.5 month old baby is happy in it and that says a lot. Its quite high for a car seat as she can actually look out of the window. Got it when there was a discount so we feel like it was a steal.
Excelente calidad y dimensiones, cómoda, a mi bebé le encantó y ahora solo le gusta sentarse ahí cuando vamos en el auto.
Es el segundo que compro de esta marca son muy buenos el primero era para recién nacido. No me arrepiento de las compras
